item.title: Ganassi switch to Honda could create serious competition with Chevrolet — finally
item.description: With Ganassi signing a multi-year deal to reignite its Honda partnership for the 2017 season and beyond, the sides are now more evenly divided competitively than in years past when Honda took a backseat to Chevrolet.
item.author: IndyStar
item.dc:creator: IndyStar
item.content:encoded: With Ganassi signing a multi-year deal to reignite its Honda partnership for the 2017 season and beyond, the sides are now more evenly divided competitively than in years past when Honda took a backseat to Chevrolet.
